name: Dim Hill
description:
The villagers of Muac have come under a strange affliction; tumors grow upon their bodies and with them maddening dreams of blood and battle. The growths steadily spread, villagers suspect it has something to do with the cursed hill nearby, where an unfamiliar hag circles at its foot.

Dim Hill is a system neutral adventure for use in any fantasy ttrpg. Monsters, Traps and Treasures can easily be inserted or converted to suite one's needs. Made entirely on iPad.
